org.apache.beam.sdk.util.state

Interface StateTag.StateBinder<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of key this binder embodies.
    Enclosing interface:
    StateTag<K,StateT extends State>

    public static interface StateTag.StateBinder<K>
    Visitor for binding a StateTag and to the associated State.

      • bindWatermark

        <W extends BoundedWindow> WatermarkHoldState<W> bindWatermark(StateTag<? super K,WatermarkHoldState<W>> address,
                                                              OutputTimeFn<? super W> outputTimeFn)
        Bind to a watermark StateTag.

        This accepts the OutputTimeFn that dictates how watermark hold timestamps added to the returned WatermarkHoldState are to be combined.
